attributes.action: Reconised medical conditions  that make you allergic to sunlight are valid disabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have a medical condition called "Chronic Actinic Dermatitis", which makes me allergic to sunlight, a few minutes exposure brings on an allergic reaction. I have applied numerous time to my local council for a parking permit. Despite my condition having a huge impact on my life, I'm told that it is not a disability even though it effects my everyday life.

I want medical conditions that make you allergic to sunlight registered as a disability !
